name: Marine Training
uniques: Eliminates combat penalty for attacking across a coast

name: Legacy of the 300
uniques: [+25]% Strength <when attacking> <when adjacent to a [{Friendly} {Melee}] unit>
[-25]% Strength <when defending> <when adjacent to a [Friendly] unit>
Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength
replacementTextForUniques: +25% Strength attacking beside another melee unit; +25% strength when defending alone. Fights at full strength regardless of damage.
